propertyInfos.label: Background image
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the start page background.
propertyInfos.name: startBackground

propertyInfos.label: Base font size
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the base font size used throughout the app.
propertyInfos.name: baseFontSize

propertyInfos.label: Title Font file
propertyInfos.name: customTitleFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the custom font to be used throughout the app for title and headings.

propertyInfos.label: Text Font file
propertyInfos.name: customTextFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the custom font to be used throughout the app for the text.

propertyInfos.label: Show logo
propertyInfos.hint: Shows or hides the logo and its link on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: startShowLogo

propertyInfos.label: Logo
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the logo displayed on the start page.
propertyInfos.name: logoImage

propertyInfos.label: Logo URL
propertyInfos.hint: URL to launch when the logo on the start page is clicked.
propertyInfos.name: logoUrl

propertyInfos.label: Phone number label
propertyInfos.hint: Label that is displayed for the phone number.
propertyInfos.name: phoneLabel

propertyInfos.label: Phone number
propertyInfos.hint: Enter the actual phone number.
propertyInfos.name: phoneNumber

propertyInfos.label: Website label
propertyInfos.hint: Label that is displayed for the website.
propertyInfos.name: websiteLabel

propertyInfos.label: Website
propertyInfos.hint: Enter the actual website Url.
propertyInfos.name: websiteUrl

propertyInfos.label: Email label
propertyInfos.hint: Label that is displayed for the email address.
propertyInfos.name: emailLabel

propertyInfos.label: Email address
propertyInfos.hint: Enter the actual email address.
propertyInfos.name: emailAddress

propertyInfos.label: Social media label
propertyInfos.hint: Label that is displayed for the social media Url.
propertyInfos.name: socialMediaLabel

propertyInfos.label: Social media
propertyInfos.hint: Enter the actual social media Url.
propertyInfos.name: socialMediaUrl

propertyInfos.label: Webmap ID for the Map to choose location.
propertyInfos.hint: You can provide one public WebMap ID that provides useful information for the user to choose report location. All default basemaps are also provides as WebMaps.
propertyInfos.name: webMapID

propertyInfos.label: Item ID for Mobile map package.
propertyInfos.hint: You can provide one public Mobile map package (mmpk) item ID that can be used to download an offline map. This functionality is available only with a secured feature service address.
propertyInfos.name: offlineMMPKID

propertyInfos.label: Feature service address
propertyInfos.hint: URL of the feature layer in which to capture the observation record. For example, http://sampleserver6.arcgisonline.com/arcgis/rest/services/ServiceRequest/FeatureServer
propertyInfos.name: featureServiceURL

propertyInfos.label: Layer Id of the feature service
propertyInfos.hint: ID of the feature layer in which to capture the observation record.
propertyInfos.name: featureLayerId

propertyInfos.label: Allow skipping of photo
propertyInfos.hint: Enables the user to skip the photo upload in the form. If false then user must provide atleast one photo.
propertyInfos.name: allowPhotoToSkip

propertyInfos.label: Thank you message
propertyInfos.hint: Feedback text to be shown when user submits a report. You can make this personable to thank the user and also have a call to action (Supports HTML links)
propertyInfos.name: thankyouMessage

propertyInfos.label: Report help link
propertyInfos.hint: Help or instructions to help fill out the report. Can be a local html file or a URL.
propertyInfos.name: reportHelpUrl

propertyInfos.label: Enable video recorder (BETA)
propertyInfos.hint: Enables video recording of up to 30 seconds to be attached as part of report.
propertyInfos.name: supportVideoRecorder

propertyInfos.label: Enable audio recorder (BETA)
propertyInfos.hint: Enables audio recording of up to 2 minutes to be attached as part of report.
propertyInfos.name: supportAudioRecorder

propertyInfos.label: Background color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the app page background.
propertyInfos.name: pageBackgroundColor

propertyInfos.label: Text color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the text.
propertyInfos.name: textColor

propertyInfos.label: Header text color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the header text.
propertyInfos.name: headerTextColor

propertyInfos.label: Header background color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the header background area.
propertyInfos.name: headerBackgroundColor

propertyInfos.label: Button color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use for the buttons throughout the app.
propertyInfos.name: buttonColor
